name: A Button In The Dark
description:
game made for the weekly game jam 165

the theme was one button mash

controls:

WASD to move

E or left mouse click to press the button

Space to jump

(it should be possible to use a controller but i don't know the controls for that)

i hope you enjoy this weird small game

credits:

tree model made by Faeriell on blendswap

download it here https://www.blendswap.com/blend/20560

everything else is made by me
